intro.title: What is Hackers' Pub?
intro.content: Hackers' Pub is a place for software engineers to share their knowledge and experience with each other. It's also an ActivityPub-enabled social network, so you can follow your favorite hackers in the fediverse and get their latest posts in your feed.

nav.openSource: The source code of this website is available on {{repository}} under the {{license}} license.

signInUp.title: Sign in/up
signInUp.description: If you have an account, we'll send you a sign-in link. If you don't have an account, we'll send you a sign-up link.
signInUp.emailNotAllowed: Email address is not allowed. Hackers' Pub is currently in closed beta. If you want to join, please contact the administrator.
signInUp.signUpEmailText:
Welcome to Hackers' Pub! To sign up, click the following link:

{{verifyUrl}}

This link will expire in {{expiration}}.

If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it.
signInUp.signInEmailText:
Welcome back to Hackers' Pub! To sign in, click the following link:

{{verifyUrl}}

This link will expire in {{expiration}}.

If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it.
signInUp.emailSentDescription: An email has been sent to {{email}} with a sign-in/up link. Please check your inbox. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
signInUp.emailSentExpires: Note that the link will expire in {{expiration}}.
signInUp.emailSentResend: You can always request a new link by signing in/up again.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.invalidCode: The sign-up link is invalid. Please make sure you're using the correct link from the email you received.
signUp.welcome: Welcome to Hackers' Pub! Please fill out the form below to complete your sign-up.
signUp.emailDescription: Your email address will be used to sign in to your account.
signUp.name: $t(settings.profile.name)

profile.title: Profile settings
profile.avatarDescription: Your avatar will be displayed on your profile and in your posts. You can upload a PNG, JPEG, GIF, or WebP image up to 5 MiB in size.
profile.avatarInvalid: Invalid image format. Please upload a PNG, JPEG, GIF, or WebP image.
profile.avatarTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size is 5 MiB.
profile.usernameDescription: Your username will be used to create your profile URL and your fediverse handle.
profile.usernameCaution: You can change it only once, and the old username will become available to others.
profile.usernameChanged: As you have already changed it {{changed}}, you can't change it again.
profile.usernameTooLong: Username is too long. Maximum length is 50 characters.
profile.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.
profile.name: Name
profile.nameDescription: Your name will be displayed on your profile and in your posts.
profile.nameTooLong: Name is too long. Maximum length is 50 characters.
profile.bioDescription: Your bio will be displayed on your profile. You can use Markdown to format it.
profile.bioTooLong: Bio is too long. Maximum length is 512 characters.
profile.linkNameDescription: A name for the link that will be displayed on your profile, e.g., GitHub.
profile.urlDescription: The URL of the link, e.g., https://github.com/yourhandle.

articleDrafts.title: Article drafts
articleDrafts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this draft?

article.remoteCommentDescription: If you have a fediverse account, you can comment on this post from your own instance. Search {{permalink}} on your instance and reply to it.

note.title: {{name}}: {{content}}
note.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
note.remoteReplyDescription: If you have a fediverse account, you can reply to this note from your own instance. Search {{permalink}} on your instance and reply to it.

editor.titleRequired: Please enter a title for your article.
editor.contentPlaceholder: Write your article here. You can use Markdown.
editor.contentRequired: Please enter some content for your article.
editor.tagsRequired: Please enter at least one tag for your article.

publishMode.title: $t(editor.publish)
publishMode.description: You're about to publish your article. Please review it before publishing.
publishMode.slugDescription: This will be a part of the permalink of your article:
publishMode.slugAlreadyTaken: An article with the same slug already exists. Please choose a different slug.
publishMode.failed: Failed to publish the article. Please try again later.

composer.contentPlaceholder: What's on your mind? You can use Markdown. Drag and drop images here to attach them.
composer.commentPlaceholder: Write a comment. You can use Markdown. Drag and drop images here to attach them.
composer.mediumAltPlaceholder: Alt text for visually impaired people
composer.postFailed: Failed to submit your post. Please try again later.

recommendedActors.title: Who to follow
recommendedActors.description: Here are some hackers you might be interested in.
